awardEventDetails.description: Christian Bale - Heath Ledger - Michael Caine - Aaron Eckhart - Morgan Freeman - Maggie Gyllenhaal - Gary Oldman

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Taurus Award
awardEventDetails.description: Rob Cooper - Richard Hansen - Mark Mottram - Andy Pilgrim - Dominic Preece - Marvin Campbell - Buster Reeves - Steen Young (Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and fights with hand to hand combat. The fight ends with five SWAT members being thrown off the side of the building.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Taurus Award
awardEventDetails.description: Rick Avery - Richard Burden - George Cottle - Tobiasz Daszkiewicz - James Fierro - Terry Jackson - Tom Lowell - Rick Miller - Jean-Pierre Goy - Jim Wilkey (Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT vans, a tractor-trailer, Batmobile and Batman's motorcycle. Driving in narrow lanes on the streets below a raised freeway, the vehicles crash and explode. The chase ends with the tractor-trailer doing a forward end over end cannon turnover.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Taurus Award
awardEventDetails.description: Mark Harper - Luke Kearney - Tom Lowell - Mark Mottram - Brian Peters (Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject themselves from the 420' building while all attached to one common line as well as separate cables attached to individual deceleration devices.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Taurus Award
awardEventDetails.description: Jim Wilkey (Stunt man drives a semi and does a large forward cannon flipping the tractor and trailer end over end.)

items.eventTitle: Science Fiction and Fantasy Writers of America

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Award of the Japanese Academy
2009 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, but wary of the consequences of rushing to action. At once brave and bravura, this epic studio presentation succeeds as blockbuster entertainment and true artistic expression from Christopher Nolan, who devised the story with David S. Goyer and co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan. Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine and Maggie Gyllenhaal lead a stellar cast marked forever in time by Heath Ledger's re-imagining of "The Joker." THE DARK KNIGHT is a movie that leaves your heart and mind racing as it redefines heroism for a new generation.)

World Stunt Awards

2009 Winner Taurus Award
Best Fight
Rob Cooper - Richard Hansen - Mark Mottram - Andy Pilgrim - Dominic Preece - Marvin Campbell - Buster Reeves - Steen Young (Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and fights with hand to hand combat. The fight ends with five SWAT members being thrown off the side of the building.)
2009 Winner Taurus Award
Best Work With a Vehicle
Rick Avery - Richard Burden - George Cottle - Tobiasz Daszkiewicz - James Fierro - Terry Jackson - Tom Lowell - Rick Miller - Jean-Pierre Goy - Jim Wilkey (Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT vans, a tractor-trailer, Batmobile and Batman's motorcycle. Driving in narrow lanes on the streets below a raised freeway, the vehicles crash and explode. The chase ends with the tractor-trailer doing a forward end over end cannon turnover.)
2009 Winner Taurus Award
Best High Work
Mark Harper - Luke Kearney - Tom Lowell - Mark Mottram - Brian Peters (Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject themselves from the 420' building while all attached to one common line as well as separate cables attached to individual deceleration devices.)
2009 Winner Taurus Award
Best Speciality Stunt
Jim Wilkey (Stunt man drives a semi and does a large forward cannon flipping the tractor and trailer end over end.)

AFI Awards, USA

2009 Winner AFI Award
Movie of the Year
(THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, but wary of the consequences of rushing to action. At once brave and bravura, this epic studio presentation succeeds as blockbuster entertainment and true artistic expression from Christopher Nolan, who devised the story with David S. Goyer and co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan. Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine and Maggie Gyllenhaal lead a stellar cast marked forever in time by Heath Ledger's re-imagining of "The Joker." THE DARK KNIGHT is a movie that leaves your heart and mind racing as it redefines heroism for a new generation.)
